title: Revert Option Appears Twice in Popup Menu
description: There are two Revert options in the menu.
OB: Two 'Revert' options are displayed in the popup menu.
EB: There should be only one 'Revert' option, and it should be disabled.
SR: 1) Open the editor. 2) Make changes to the content. 3) Make sure the editor is in a 'dirty' state. 4) Right-click to open the popup menu.
